title: Marian's French onion soup
ingredients: ['4 onions, chopped', '50g butter', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '800ml beef stock', '300ml water', '1/2 teaspoon dried parsley', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '250ml white wine', '1 baguette, cut into 1cm slices', '250g mozzarella cheese, grated']
